values:
You see this crest?
Yes, well. I'll wear it soon. On my chest. Along with the orange equipment. Someone pinch me please
Draco was captured. Voldemort has my Draco. Oh God. Oh God!
Ow. Bloody ow. And now I'm going to need a new pair of glasses. Just fucking great.

Hermione, how are you feeling? How's your mum, any news? <s>I'd like it if we could meet, I miss you.</s>

What about the rest of you? I've seen you around, but I've been rather busy and couldn't talk. So, how have you all been?

They said I can't go yet. Bugger. Unfortunately they didn't tell me when I could see you, but Dumbledore promised I would be able to go there. Just not now. Dumbledore, amidst Snape's snarky comments, told me the story of the Brotherhood and also of the Knights of Walpurgis. Turns out Voldemort wants you so that he can become immortal, a God, since you are "the purest of blood" and "the key to ascension". You probably know this already but... *shrugs* I didn't know. I fear for you I love you. I promise I won't let him get you. I'd rather die I miss you so much

My sight is back, and it's as bad as it was before it was gone. Thank Merlin, no more of that blasted darkness!


Draco, where the hell are you? <s>Wanna see you...</s>
If I know that anyone even thinks of hurting or offending my boyfriend, Draco Malfoy, again, that person is going to spend the rest of their pitiful life in St. Mungo's. Are we clear? Good.
Maybe you should all just get away from me. I'm dangerous, I may hurt you without even being aware of it.

I never thought I'd be spending my seventeenth birthday on a bloody mission to rescue Pansy bloody Parkinson. Yeah, I'm with one of my best friends and with my <s>lover</s> <s>boyfriend</s> "special friend", but it's not the same. 
We're going to have to catch a train to London and the Knight Bus to Cardiff,but we also have a damsel in distress (not that I can see Pansy in that role but, whatever. She is one at the moment) that needs to be rescued and quite a few abductors to defeat, who can be Death Eaters for all we know. 
On top of it all, I'm feeling insecure. I don't know how Draco will react to Parkinson's return, and I'm scared to think that he may go back to her. To that "more than just friends" relationship they have. And I don't know if I can handle that. 
I love him more than anything and I know he loves me too, and I just wish wish that my fear doesn't have any reasoning. 
 
God, I wish Corner was here. I'm in dire need of some stress relief. *sighs*

I'm so <s>in love and</s> happy, I think I could fly. Really fly, not on a broom. I think I'm going to sprout wings any minute now. My pessimistic side, however, tells me that at any moment I can wake up and it will be just another dream. But the happiness I feel easily overcomes that pessimism. 

<s>I love him. I can't help it, it's true.</s>
